alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Buffalo, southwestern Sherman and northeastern Dawson Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ravenna to near Amherst. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to around 40 to possibly 50 MPH and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ravenna, Pleasanton, Litchfield, Amherst, Sumner, Miller, Hazard and Poole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
